CustomField.formula: IF( AND(ISNULL(termination_at__c), zz_certificate_disabled__c = "", TEXT(standard_integration_status__c) != "0", churn_score__c <= 67, last_review_more_than_2_weeks_ago__c = FALSE), IMAGE("https://trustedshops--c.eu11.content.force.com/servlet/servlet.ImageServer?id=0150Y000001aH1Q&oid=00D3L0000000dtj&lastMod=1508508173000UNBRAUCHBAR", "All fine.")+" "+BR(), '') + IF(!ISNULL(termination_at__c), "Shop cancelled (valid to: " + TEXT(DATEVALUE( valid_to__c )) + ")" + BR() , "") + IF(zz_certificate_disabled__c != "", IMAGE("../servlet/servlet.ImageServer?id=0159E000000AgA2&oid=00D9E0000000cQs&lastMod=1505462681000", "Certificate disabled") + " " + zz_certificate_disabled__c + BR(), "") + IF(TEXT(standard_integration_status__c) = "0", IMAGE("https://trustedshops--c.eu11.content.force.com/servlet/servlet.ImageServer?id=0150Y0000026spA&oid=00D3L0000000dtj&lastMod=1508157065000", "No Standard Integration") + " No Standard Integration" + BR() , "") + IF(last_review_more_than_2_weeks_ago__c = TRUE, "Last Review more than 2 weeks ago (" + TEXT(DATEVALUE( last_review__c)) + ")"+BR(), "") + IF(ISPICKVAL(rating_widget__c, 'disabled'), "Rating Widget DISABLED", "")+ BR()
CustomField.label: Critical Shop Information
